wikipedia_page.main: William Lawies Jackson, 1st Baron Allerton,  (16 February 1840 – 4 April 1917) was a British businessman and Conservative politician.

response: Jackson was born in Leeds. His father was William Jackson, 1st Baron Allerton.  During Stanley's time at Harrow School his fag was fellow parliamentarian and future Prime Minister Winston Churchill. He went up to Trinity College, Cambridge in 1889.
*William Jackson, 1st Baron Allerton (1840–1917), English politician, Member of Parliament for Leeds
